sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"绝望，沮丧"之意。
means: despair ： 普通用词，指因灾难等因素而丧失希望和信心，陷入沮丧，绝望的境地。
desperation ： 语气强烈，指因绝望而使人采取无所顾忌的疯狂行动。
depression ： 侧重指因遭受重大失利或挫折而产生的低落情绪。
disappointment ： 多指愿望或期望的落空。

sentence.Network_en: Frustration, anger and desperation have led to a series of wildcat strikes.
sentence.Network_cn: 挫败感、愤怒和绝望引起了一系列自发性的罢工。
我走投无路，于是改变了策略。

sentence.Network_en: In desperation I joined a physical exercise class.
sentence.Network_cn: 在绝望中我参加了一个健身班。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, from Latin desperatio(n-), from the verb desperare (see despair)

entry.tran: 绝望;孤注一掷;铤而走险;拼命
entry.def: Desperation is the feeling that you have when you are in such a bad situation that you will try anything to change it.

example.ex: This feeling of desperation and helplessness was common to most of the refugees...
example.tran: 大多数难民都有这种绝望和无助的感觉。

example.ex: In desperation I joined a physical exercise class.
example.tran: 在绝望中我参加了一个健身班。

means.word_mean: 1. a state in which everything seems wrong and will turn out badly;

sentences.sentence: "they were rescued from despair at the last minute"

auth_sentence.content: There's such a whiff of desperation about it.
auth_sentence.res_content: There's such a whiff of desperation about it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's such a whiff of desperation about it.

auth_sentence.content: Desperation honed up her wits to a razor edge.

auth_sentence.content: The only thing your statement demonstrates is your desperation.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不顾一切的,铤而走险的;绝望的,危急的
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉+sper希望+ate……的→去掉希望的
pro很多+sper希望+ous……的→希望很多→兴旺的
a不+sper希望+ity表名词→不给人希望→粗鲁,暴力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 暴徒,[尤指早期美国西部的]亡命之徒
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉,无+sper希望+ado人→无希望之人
desperate[adj.不顾一切的,铤而走险的;绝望的,危急的]+ion表名词→n.铤而走险,拼命

stems_affixes.value_cn: 成功,兴隆,昌盛,使成功,使昌隆,繁荣
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro很多+sper希望→很多的希望→繁荣

sentences.en: In desperation, I decided to try acupuncture.
sentences.cn: 我别无出路，就决定试试针刺疗法。

sentences.en: At the end of the film, the man becomes a thief out of sheer desperation.
sentences.cn: 在电影的结尾，这个人由于彻底绝望而成了小偷。

sentences.en: In his desperation to escape, Tom had slipped and broken a leg.
sentences.cn: 汤姆在拼命逃跑时滑倒摔断了一条腿。
